subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Considering that his old buddy Roger Clemens had thrown him under the stagecoach five days earlier, Andy Pettitte was in a tolerant mood Monday, even if it fell slightly short of turning the other cheek.
snippet: Considering that his old buddy Roger Clemens had thrown him under the stagecoach five days earlier, Andy Pettitte was in a tolerant mood Monday, even if it fell slightly short of turning the other cheek.
